com.github.projetp1.rs232

Class RS232

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.projetp1.rs232.RS232
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    jssc.SerialPortEventListener

    public class RS232
extends Object
implements jssc.SerialPortEventListener
    The class that manages the RS-232 connection and communications.
    Author:
    alexandr.perez, sebastie.vaucher

        Returns:
